requirements.plaintext: Talk to Dr. Livingstone or activate any of the three monuments to begin this quest.
requirements.markdown: Talk to ◀Dr. Livingstone▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dr._Livingstone▷ or activate any of the three monuments to begin this quest.

substeps.plaintext: The village to the south requires you to fight a Wooden Shield Mitachurl. Defeat it to unlock a Precious chest and the Electro monument.
substeps.markdown: The village to the south requires you to fight a ◀Wooden Shield Mitachurl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wooden_Shield_Mitachurl▷. Defeat it to unlock a Precious chest and the Electro monument.

substeps.plaintext: The village to the north requires you to fight a few rounds in an arena against slimes, samachurls, and a Wooden Shield Mitachurl. Defeat them to unlock the Cryo monument, 2 Exquisite chests, and 2 Common chests. You must defeat them all within 100 seconds.
substeps.markdown: The village to the north requires you to fight a few rounds in an arena against ◀slimes▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Slimes▷, ◀samachurls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Samachurls▷, and a Wooden Shield Mitachurl. Defeat them to unlock the Cryo monument, 2 Exquisite chests, and 2 Common chests. You must defeat them all within 100 seconds.

substeps.plaintext: The village to the east requires you to fight a Wooden Shield Mitachurl, an Anemo Samachurl, and a Cryo Abyss Mage. Defeat them to unlock a Precious chest and the Pyro monument.
substeps.markdown: The village to the east requires you to fight a Wooden Shield Mitachurl, an Anemo Samachurl, and a Cryo ◀Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Abyss_Mage▷. Defeat them to unlock a Precious chest and the Pyro monument.

steps.plaintext: Obtain the treasure at the center of the Sword Cemetery
steps.markdown: Obtain the treasure at the center of the Sword Cemetery

substeps.plaintext: The Luxurious Chest contains a Northlander Claymore Billet, a 4-star artifact, and Mystic Enhancement Ore.
substeps.markdown: The Luxurious ◀Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chest▷ contains a ◀Northlander Claymore Billet▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Northlander_Claymore_Billet▷, a 4-star artifact, and ◀Mystic Enhancement Ore▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mystic_Enhancement_Ore▷.
